Package com.fdm.model

Class Actor

java.lang.Object
com.fdm.model.Actor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, PlayerCharacter
@Component
@Entity
public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
The abstract class Actor contains the base logic and shared information for anything which can exist and move on the map It implements Runnable as all actors will have their own threads
Version:
1.0
Author:
KILA

  • Method Details

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage​(int damage, Actor attacker)
      method for this actor to take damage the actor will die if the damage exceeds its currentHP - and will add exp to the attacker
      Parameters:
      damage - - the amount of damage to receive
      attacker - - the actor who dealt the attack

    • heal

      public void heal​(int amount)
      method for healing the actor
      Parameters:
      amount - - amount of currentHP to heal for

    • addKillAndGainExp

      public void addKillAndGainExp​(int amount)
      When this actor killed another actor it will gain exp equal to the other's value and the kill count will be incremented levelUps are called if the exp exceeds 100 after the kill
      Parameters:
      amount - - amount of exp to add

    • levelup

      public void levelup()
      Increase stats and decrease exp

    • attack

      public void attack​(Enemy target)
      called when this hits an enemy. Only enemies and their subclasses can be attacked
      Parameters:
      target - to deal damage to

    • run

      public void run()
      Thread method waits on a shared key to make a move and then tries to move
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
